Another event concocted by Haruhi happens ...
155312222222221221.content:
N.B. : Like in the anime, I tried to tell this story as if the narrator is Kyon !! I hope you would like my efforts...



It'll be a month since the cultural festival of the school was over, and the sun does not seem to want to save its strength. Yet we approach winter, but we are going to fan themselves in the class so much it is warm. To believe that Mother Nature is completely lost ... I must say, I understand her: with the girl and her megacosmic powers who always sits behind me, anyone would be disoriented.

Finally, I should not complain too much: since the episode of the cultural festival, Haruhi has not yet invented a completely stupid idea she has the secret. I'm sure the world takes advantage of this moment of respite to relax until this madwoman gets back into action. And I confess, I also appreciate the long quiet time ... let's hope that it lasts ...

Haruhi : "Come on, Kyon! Let's go!"

Here I am leaving class, following this degenerate Haruhi. Lately, I find her rather thoughtful. Knowing her, we will arrive at the local and she will show us an idea of madwoman that will still give us a monstrous job to put everything back. Anyway, she must not count on me to whisper her, and to find ideas for the Brigade. I have enough work with exams approaching, no need to add to me... Hey, we are already at the local? We arrived faster than I thought ... maybe I'm getting crazy, too ...

Mikuru: "Ah, here you are! Don't worry, the tea is almost ready!"

Do not worry, Mikuru. You can take all your time, your tea will still be delicious ... On the other hand, Yuki still has as much presence as a pencil left on a desktop after the end of the lessons. She remains as impassive as usual. The tea Mikuru just serve me gives me a heat more intense than the fire of a volcano, and a taste more incredible than the chef's speciality served in a four-star restaurant. Now the door opens, leaving Itsuki to enter, still smiling. Yuki should take him a part of his emotions: Itsuki has enough and it can only do her good. Like every day since the cultural festival, I play with Itsuki, hoping that the defeat will make him lose at least one second that smile he wears constantly. After three games where Itsuki won with his condescending look, I fail to lose my cool because the silence of Haruhi worries me. I'm afraid she us creates new problems alone. Preferring to be prevented, I walk up to behind her, seeing what she looks on the computer. I see her do some research on the internet with a keyword that I noticed very quickly: "Dwarf"

Kyon: "Haruhi, May I know what you're doing?"

Haruhi: "It is not clear ? I am looking for infos about dwarves, I need to know more!"

Kyon: "Yeah, and what good will that do you to know this?"

Haruhi: "Well, like that, tomorrow, we start searching dwarves, for catching specimens!"

I thought so. It was too good that she stays quiet any longer.

Haruhi: "Do you realize the horrible life that the poor must have...?"

Kyon: "Oh yeah ? And can you explain why?"

Haruhi: "But, Kyon, this is perfectly obvious: the dwarfs are tiny, we never see. So they scramble to avoid being crushed beneath our feet. the least of our small actions can cause them kill. by drinking his glass, it could swallow one. Even sneezing, they would blow out of the room and they would crash to the ground. The most harmless act which is would suffice to eliminate a dwarf... "

But of course ... by definition, the dwarves are tiny ... so tiny that maybe, they don't exist ... Well, I've known you long enough to know that it is useless to discuss with you: we listen and obey!

Haruhi: "So I thought we should look for survivors, while they're left, to keep them safe, and in order that the future generations will remember that they be careful of what they do ... "

Of course, it is sure that the future generations will pay attention to where they put their feet, in order to not crush dwarves or even ants ... And that didn't cross your mind that these small guys perhaps don't wish that they are put in a cage.

Haruhi: "So, starting tomorrow, the SOS Brigade began looking dwarves. Each of you will search every corner of the school, their homes and the city to find a maximum of them.. do not forget to bring a magnifying glass. Whoever forgets will be deprived of games for a month! "

Following this announcement, Haruhi turned off her computer, grabbed her bag and headed out of the room. But just behind Yuki, to everyone's surprise, Haruhi dropped a violent fart, which slightly raised her skirt and made blush Mikuru.

Kyon "Oooooh, Haruhi! You might be careful, though!"

Haruhi: "So what ? What offends you, Kyon?"

Kyon: "Huh?"

Haruhi: "I do not know what bothers you ... Farting is a phenomenon that occurs naturally in all living beings. I do not understand exactly why people hold back themselves as much as possible in public. Doing so, they screw up their health and their digestive system works less and less well ... That's why I think everyone should blow up as soon as you feel the need ... "

Yeah ... Haruhi is really unique. Earlier, she warned us to be careful about what we did, and now she openly announced that farting is normal. I hope she will prevent her from farting when she will search dwarfs, otherwise she risks to asphixiate them before to find them!

Itsuki: "I bow to your knowledge and your ideals, Haruhi"

Still bootlicker. Go, come on, Itsuki, release a fart in class, and you will see all the girls get away from you ...

Mikuru: "It's true, you're probably right ... well, I think!"

Oh no, Mikuru ... Please, do not ruin such a pretty body with the manners of Haruhi.

On that last act, Haruhi grabbed the door and left the room, leaving us all breathe to relieve themselves.

Itsuki: "Kyon, would you go open the window ? I know it's natural, but I admit that Haruhi wasn't holding back, here"

Kyon: "Well Well! I thought you share her opinion, just now ..."

Itsuki: "Personally, it's not her manners and her behavior that worries me, But rather her new project ...".

Well, even Itsuki shows a little anxiety about the very hot project announced by Haruhi. For once we share the same opinion...

Itsuki: "I do not know what awaits us tomorrow, but if she is convinced that the dwarves exist, then we should expect to find one of them. After all, Haruhi has the ability to change the world according to her desires. It is likely that we have to be faced with new adventures tomorrow. Anyway, I'm curious to see what we find ... "

Mikuru: "Huuuuum ... Kyon ..."

Kyon: "What's wrong, Mikuru?"

Mikuru: "It's Yuki. For 5 minutes, she did not change page of her book ...".

Well, it's true. I know that Yuki is not talkative, but here, I do not even see them winking. I slowly approach Yuki, asking if it's okay, but just by shaking a little, she falls to the ground, dropping his book with the face still impenetrable ...

Kyon: "Yuki, Are you okay?"

Itsuki: "Wait, let me see ... Okay, she just lost consciousness."

Lost knowledge? How can Yuki faint keeping eyes open ? I know she's an alien, but when you faint, you have still more expression than that ... That's it, Yuki wakes ...

Kyon: "Yuki, are you okay ? What's going to you?"

Yuki: "It's nothing ... My system has encountered an error due to the intrusion of a gaseous-type foreign body of unknown nature that Haruhi's system has produced, and I was forced to reboot all my data... "

Wait, she would have fainted by breathing Haruhi's fart ...!? Unbelievable ... Haruhi, you've found the fatal weapon against the extraterrestrial : your gas!

This little surprise over, I continued to do a few games with Itsuki, Mikuru remaining seated on a chair and Yuki flipping one to one the pages of her book. Then, time is getting on the clock is ticking time is running out, I decided to go home, to rest one last time before going in search of what does not exist. Aliens, espers, time travelers, and now dwarfs ... let's hope that she doesn't dream of finding giants one day, I have no wish to escape one of these Shinjis or another gigantic creature. I arrived home, my little sister was still bothering me, thinking that his big brother has to obey every tantrum. I have already obey those of Haruhi, so she must not expect me to please him. I fell asleep in my bed, quietly, with great anxiety, fearing the next day. What I did not know yet, that's what was going to reserve for me the next day ... Ooooh, if only Haruhi could repeat the episode of 15,532 summers we spent without realizing it. We could avoid this hunt for dwarves tomorrow...

What I did not know yet, that's what I was going to live tomorrow, and something tells me that I will not appreciate ...
155312222222221221.title: The new whim of Haruhi

1553122222222212211.content:
... on ...

My sleep, hitherto quiet, suddenly becomes agitated. Voices come to disturb that refreshing sleep I was hoping to enjoy ...

... kyon ...

The voices are becoming clearer, and I feel suddenly hit by continuous shaking. I feel like one of those construction workers, who returned after a grueling day to have held and operating the jackhammer I was in charge. No, come on, I still have sleep ...

KYON ..., WAKE UP !!

This incredibly strong voice so surprised me, I felt the inexplicable need to open my eyes as soon as possible. Just above my head, I see the face of an resplendent angel fall from heaven, the one of Mikuru. When I woke up, I just noticed that Yuki and Itsuki are also present. Until then, nothing very surprising ... but it's only now that I realize that an abnormal thing happens: I'm not in my room. Stranger still, I have the school's outfit on me. Still, I'm sure that I change myself before to go to bed last night. Itsuki then approaches me with his eternally annoying smile.

Itsuki: "Okay, Kyon? You feel good?"

Kyon: "Let's say that it will get better when you are away from me , you're too close!"

Itsuki: "Well, at least, I see that you are in your normal state, it reassures me."

Kyon: "Why do you ask ? And where you are, first?"

Itsuki: "If only I knew ... The problem is that after I slept at home, I woke up here, without knowing why. Yuki was awake the first, and Mikuru and you were the last to wake up. neither Yuki or Mikuru have no idea about our situation. "

Apparently we all meet in the same boat ... but on the other hand, the captain in charge of our probable shipwreck seems to be part of the missing.

Kyon: "Hey, you know where Haruhi is?"

Mikuru: "umm ... Actually, we did not see her here."

The opposite would have surprised me, I must say. But personally, I had an idea of where on all is. Just by seeing around us a totally white universe, heaven like ground, for me, it was obvious.

Kyon: "Say, Yuki. By the greatest chance, we would not be in a closed space created by Haruhi?"

Yuki: "No. I've already checked the spatio-temporal data of this place, and they correspond to those of our universe.".

This is not a closed space? I admit that I was starting to freak out. We are clearly not in our world, yet, Yuki says otherwise. Besides, the air present here is rather sickening. And I've never felt a ground as soft and fluffy before ...

Itsuki: "Yuki, if I understand correctly, we are not in a closed space, but in our world, are we?"

Yuki: "Yes"

Itsuki: "In this case, could you locate Haruhi?"

Yuki: "Right now"

Kyon: "Wait a minute. you want to ask her for help ? But I thought you wanted to avoid her to know about your background and her powers of a cosmic scale ..."

Itsuki: "I know, but in this case, I'm not trying to get in touch with her. I just want to know where we are compared to her..."

He is not wrong. If that's Haruhi, the source of the problem, then she must surely not be far from here ...

Yuki: "I have her position. Haruhi is within a radius of 10.22 meters from us, above us to 1.06 meters in the direction South-East.."

It's not worth being so precisely, Yuki. I did not understand everything you said after ... What, Haruhi is just 10 meters from us? But then ... it should be here !!

Kyon: "HARUHI !! WHERE ARE YOU !?"

Itsuki: "Useless, Kyon. We have already sought in the area. that said, it's weird ... how can she be so close to us, whereas we do not manage to see here.. Besides, it should not be difficult to distinguish a girl in an all-white world."

There, it gets really scary. Even Itsuki is puzzled by this. As for Mikuru, she looked panicked since early already, so now it's much worse ... If only Yuki could tell us on what we are embarked ...

No, come on, calm down ... focus ... think about what you want Haruhi ...

"Well, like that, tomorrow, we start searching dwarves, for catching specimens!"

That's what she said yesterday. So ... HHHHH !! Haruhi ... no ... It's not possible ... You do not have wished that ...

Just when I realized what had happened to us, we are all surprised by violent earthquakes, very short but which were repeated rhythmically. It reminded me of the time when Haruhi and I ran away on seeing the Shinjis coming to us. At that time, I felt similar shaking. Sensing the danger approaching ...

Kyon: "Quickly !! Everybody clings to the ground! And do not let go!"

Everyone quickly obeyed, without question, jumping to the ground and grabbing the strange material that constitutes it. Even Yuki which ordinarily takes time before reacting, has not lost time, as if she understood the situation too.

Mikuru: "B-B-B-B-But what happens?"

Earthquakes are becoming more intense, to the point that I do not know if we have succeeded to stand much longer. Suddenly, the shaking has stopped suddenly, leaving a heavy silence. Suddenly we heard the sound all around us ...

"Ah, there it is!"

The events which succeeded only confirmed my fears more.

Mikuru: "But ... It was like the voice of Haruhi!"

Itsuki: "You're right, Mikuru. It was her voice, I recognized it, too!"

Me too, I had realized. Tremors, Haruhi's voice that resonates as strong ... I did not make a mistake. Suddenly it feels like all pulled down, like the guys in the movies who are trying to hold as best they could to an airplane in flight. Mikuru then began to scream, not understanding what is happening to us, then I see the white sky discover and give way to a kind of ceiling. It gave me the impression of watching a movie, the film in question running at full speed. In the movement, I still had time to see the face of Haruhi. Except ... that face was incredibly big. Manhandled in all directions, like a ship in a storm, then we saw two giant columns across the ground we clung, these columns are the same color as my skin. These columns swelled quickly. I felt as if gravity had increased and was trying to keep me pinned to the ground. Raising the head as best they could, I could see two spheres plump after these columns. And then ...
1553122222222212211.title: Our universe takes on new dimensions (part one)

15531222222222122111.content:
tchac

These roller coaster had finally stopped tormenting us. Each of us was trying to regain his senses and was checking with the look that everyone was there ...

Itsuki: "Everyone's okay?"

Mikuru: "Y- Yes!"

Yuki: "Okay."

Kyon: "Yeah, me too ..."

We all fell within, only to find that the spheres, which I had seen earlier, were just around us, we found ourselves right in between the two giant balloons.

Mikuru: "B-B-B-But what is that?"

Kyon: "Yuki, you can tell us where is Haruhi now?"

Mikuru: "Huh?"

Mikuru could not help but be surprised by my question. Yuki did not waste any time.

Yuki: "Haruhi is located within a radius of 0,001 mm from us, towards the northeast..."

Mikuru: "Huh? She is also close? B- B- But I see nowhere."

Kyon: "Unfortunately, yes, Mikuru. We see indeed.."

Mikuru: "Huh ? Where is she? Where is she?

I put a little time to reflect. I admit I felt bad the idea to tell her our situation. Then I told myself, anyway, she was going to find out. So I took a deep breath and I pointed my finger to where the two giant spheres stick.

Kyon: "She's there, right in front of us."

Mikuru: "Huh? You mean Haruhi is trapped between these two big balls?"

Kyon: "No, actually, it's rather us who are trapped."

Mikuru: "Huh?"

Kyon: "In fact, the two balls ... These are Haruhi's butt."

At that time, Mikuru was silent, then blushed, understanding only now that she is actually in front of Haruhi's ass. Itsuki, he, had abandoned his annoying smile, but without seeming surprised by what I said. I'm willing to bet that he too had realized ... as Yuki, too!

Itsuki: "Yuki, you could tell us the size that we are all right now?"

Yuki: "One second, I check ..."

Mikuru: "B-b-b-but what happens to us?"

Itsuki: " Mikuru! Stay calm, please!"

It's easy for you to say. You could not get you a little in her place sometime? A normal person would have already blown his head with all the ludicrous ideas of Haruhi ...

Yuki: "After verification, the average of our current size is equivalent to 0.0327654 inches, for an average of 1/32 inch."

Kyon: " Are you kidding ? We are as small as that?"

Itsuki: "Hmm ... Given our size, it is useless to hope that Haruhi finds us ... which is not so bad, I must say."

Kyon: " What are you talking about ? We can not stay here, it's too dangerous. Come on, I call it!."

Itsuki: "Wait, I imagine the scene here: Hello, Haruhi ? This is me, Kyon! You could help us. We are in your pants."

Kyon: "Yes, well, OK. But think about. There is only her who can get us out of there."

Itsuki: "Do not say anything! Just imagine that Haruhi us found at that size. if it happens, she may believe that the dwarves really exist ... And in this case..."

Kyon: "We may all be found in microscopic size preventing that Haruhi does not walk on us, right?"

Itsuki: "Exactly! And it's not as if we had no emergency exit we can count on the help of our friend Yuki, no?"

Now that I think about it, it's true that in most situations, it is Yuki who helped us out. Like the time Asakura tried to kill me, or when I was trapped three years earlier with Mikuru. ...

Yuki: "Actually ..."

Kyon & Itsuki: "Hmm?"

Yuki: "There is a way to restore the modified data by Haruhi and make our normal state, but its use may cause a light beam of very high intensity, which will be located by any form of organic life, including Haruhi. the Data Integration Thought Entity considers that the probability that Haruhi sees the appearance of the light beam is 74.5684%. "

Itsuki: "I see ... That is, if we try to put everything in order now, we run the risk that Haruhi notes, which brings us back to the initial problem."

Yuki: "Absolutely."

Itsuki: "In this case, if we attempt to use the system when Haruhi is asleep, do you think she might not realize it?"

Yuki: "The risks would be reduced, but only at 43.7422%, however, by performing first a displacement in an adjoining room at a reasonable distance from the Haruhi's room, the chances that Haruhi might notice are 0,0000136% "

Itsuki: "In this case, we have no choice: we will have to stay here all day."

Unfortunately, I was forced to be the opinion of Itsuki. If Yuki even think it is dangerous to leave now, so it's no use trying to argue. Mikuru seemed downcast, resigned to having to stay here with really high risk, that even Itsuki and Yuki can not save us immediately. I admit that I feel uncomfortable: finding myself in Haruhi's pants ... I have the impression to steal her privacy ... Well, it's true that at first she doesn't waiting for the boys in the class coming out to change, and the first time, I could not help but see her bra ... But there is another level, though. Fortunately, her buttocks are so impressive you can not see what there is on the other side. Hmmm ... the ground shakes a little, I think ...

Kyon: "Say, Itsuki. I know, from our point of view, it's like a trampoline, and we can not do nothing but wait. But you could stop jumping on it like that.?"

Itsuki: "What are you talking about ? I'm not jumpin ...

I have not heard what Itsuki said at the end, but I do not have to. We were all surprised by a huge roar, as if someone had screamed from the bottom of the cave and the echo of his voice would have sent to the exit. The tremors were becoming stronger, so that Itsuki fell to the ground (well, on the panties of Haruhi). On the other hand, Yuki remained straight as an arrow, looking completely insensitive to shakes worthy of those that shakes the towers of Tokyo. Mikuru, she, was curled up on herself, squatting to the ground, hands on head, trembling even more than us ...

Mikuru: "Oh no ... Haruhi ... Haruhi is going ..."

Kyon: "She's going what ? Go ahead, express yourself ..."

Mikuru: "She ... She is going to f -... fa ..."

I did not hear her answer because another roar, more powerful still echoes in my ears. But what I did not know is that this boom was accompanied by an impressive squall, which literally blew us all to the bottom of Haruhi's pant. We would have planted some buildings in the area, it would not have surprised me that three quarters collapse under the force of the impact. I have absolutely not seen anything coming. A little stunned by this hurricane, I tried to stand up, which I was asked a lot of effort as my knees were shaking ...

Kyon: " Are you okay ? Everyone is fin ..."

When we are surprised by something spectacular, we tend to take a breath, to collect as much as possible of oxygen. This is at least what I've noticed in all disaster movies. But when I tried to breathe once, too, I felt an incredible disgust. This smell ... it looks like a dump of old tires that would be burning for days, or they would spread manure in a field of agriculture.

Kyon: "I can not believe ... Haruhi just ... farts !?"

I can not believe it ... She has only let a fart and it has as much effect as that !? I stood in awe of the omnipotence of Haruhi.

Itsuki: "Cough Cough ... I admit that I was surprised ... but at the same time, given our size, even a light breeze might look like a hurricane from our point of view ... then, of course, when it is already a powerful blast at the base ... "

And since when you're an expert? I thought Yuki would add a comment to Itsuki's reaction but Mikuru was by her side. Yuki was lying on the ground, her face impassive. she surely had to restart like yesterday.

And the worst is that the day is just beginning. We will have to endure much longer this time ...

Haruhi: "Hmmm ... I have my magnifying glass ... Come on, let's go for hunting dwarves ..."

info.brief_description: Welcome in Haruhi Suzumiya's world where some people are gassy
info.description:
You're a normal human when you're transported in the world of the Haruhi Suzumiya. In this world, some people uses you to let off his (her) gas. If you write here, first read this rules below.

- Don't invent a character and don't appear character of other anime, unless the story continues in the real world. Uses only characters of the anime of Haruhi Suzumiya.

- Your story must focus on you and one of the characters of the anime (or 2 characters of the anime). But you can involve other characters in the story, or add them temporarily in the characters on which you focus.

- Don't forget that some people have special powers : you have the right to include the use of some of them (para-psychic, alien, time ...) and to show the tools related to these areas.

- you can change the size of your characters during the story but you must explain how this change size happens. (for example, a size gun of the future, ...). Note that if you introduced an object that changes the size, you can just quote him afterwards.

- You can report noise by using words and onomatopoeia (for example : "then a deafening explosion ..." or "then you heard : PPPFFFRRRTTT")

- Your chapters must to be enough long, unless you offer a series of choice pairs. In general, write at least an paragraph and thousand letters.

- Space out your paragraphs and make it enough for it to be easily readable.

- Dialogue is encouraged.

- Write with an proper english. This is not to bore you but remember that you are not the only reading what you write.

- No End. If you want to make an end chapter (or a series of chapter which follow and end at a time), before let an choice in order to continue the story.

- You must focus on fart but you can show other fetishes.

- Be creative.
